about_long:
CryptoGuardAI (CGAI) is an AI‑assisted navigation system for the crypto market. Our goal: empower people to act clearly and with discipline—without hype or panic. We build tools that deliver real value: live market overview, understandable analysis and structured decision‑making.

What we are today: a focused, independent team. We do not promise profits and we do not provide financial advice. We deliver orientation, transparency and processes so decisions become traceable.

Our roadmap: expand tools (whale signals, events, heatmaps), personal areas with subscription features, and extend to stocks/ETFs. Quality and honesty over hype—always.
